message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $13,000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand you're looking for a good deal.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's see if we can make this work!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000? I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
